sen.j: 堀河天皇・鳥羽天皇・崇徳天皇の3天皇（つまり白河・鳥羽院政）時代の朝廷における行事・叙位・修法などの諸儀式について詳細に記述してあり、後世有職故実の書物として重んじられた。
sen.e: Various ceremonies such as events, investitures, incantation that happened during the eras of the three emperors, Emperor Horikawa, Emperor Toba and Emperor Sutoku (in other words, the cloistered government period of Shirakawa and Toba) are described in detail and is treasured by researchers as a well-written knowledgeable account.
